title: The Heroic Week of Kevin Johnson: From Ordinary to Extraordinary
summary: Kevin Johnson, a 71-year-old with a passion for coaching, discovers an ancient artifact that bestows him with powers, leading him to become a superhero who protects his community from looming threats.
summaryGerman: Kevin Johnson, ein 71-Jähriger mit einer Leidenschaft für das Coaching, entdeckt ein uraltes Artefakt, das ihm Kräfte verleiht und ihn dazu bringt, als Superheld seine Gemeinde vor drohenden Gefahren zu schützen.
summaryDutch: Kevin Johnson, een 71-jarige met een passie voor coaching, ontdekt een oud artefact dat hem krachten geeft, waardoor hij een superheld wordt die zijn gemeenschap beschermt tegen dreigende gevaren.
summaryFrench: Kevin Johnson, 71 ans, passionné de coaching, découvre un artefact ancien lui conférant des pouvoirs, le transformant en super-héros qui protège sa communauté des menaces imminentes.

story.text: Kevin stumbles upon an ancient artifact while volunteering at the local museum. The artifact grants him the ability to manipulate time and space.
Kevin, feeling the new energy coursing through him, decides to test his powers by helping a lost child find their way home, creating a shortcut through dimensions.
Kevin begins coaching his local youth baseball team not just in sports, but also imparts lessons on virtue and courage, subtly using his powers to boost their performance.
A local gang threatens the peace of his community. Kevin intervenes, using his powers to avert a robbery at the community center.
Newfound fame as a mysterious guardian angel of the neighborhood puts Kevin in the spotlight, yet he remains humble and focused on helping others.
Longing for a bit of normalcy, Kevin spends the day sharing stories with old friends, reminiscing about the days before his transformation.
As threats subside, Kevin finds a way to merge his love for coaching with his superhero deeds, establishing a community program focused on empowering the youth.

ending: At week's end, Kevin Johnson, once a simple coach, embraced his role as a superhero, proving it's never too late to make a difference.
moral: No matter the age, one can always be a force for good in the community.
